attributes.title: 2010 Audi A4 2.0 TDI Ambition Auto

attributes.description:
Service plan up to 31 December 2022 or 100 000Km. 
Warranty up to 31 December 2022 or 100 000Km. 

Features:
Bmw Led Headlights,
Park Pilot,
Bluetooth,
Paddle Shift,
Multi Function Steering Wheel,
Cruise Control
Rear PDC,
18 Inch Alloys,
Smash & Grab,
Sun Roof,
Satellite Navigation.

A BMW 2 Series is undoubtedly one of the coolest cars to be created. A coupe model of this is a compelling prospect if you consider the beautiful interior, superior driving dynamics, and headroom that goes on for kilometers!  This contrast of Blue paintwork with Black leather seats makes a powerful statement of this car and its character. A car like this is about more than A to B. This 220i is about having a riot throughout all the alphabets in style and comfort.

Nationwide Delivery.
t&c's apply.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. Experience the joy of life's adventures in a bigger 7 seater, bolder crossover that has everything you need to go out there. Muscular styling and solid capabilities will keep you in control & give you all the space, comfort & flexibility you need to enjoy your action packed trips. Its the perfect fit for you and your family taking adventure to a new level. This X-trail comes equipped with a reverse camera as well as 360 degree view.

Call or visit us now to book a test drive.
